Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • Board
  • public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
    this class is the board and the methods for lacing disks in the board and sets a board for a new game and changes it and prints it and has a method for the end of the game
    Version:
    2020
    Author:
    Moujan Mirjalili

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Board()
      this is the constructor it makes a new board considering the othello rules for anew game

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void changeBoard1​(int x, int y, int i, int j)
      this method changes the board for the valid move (black player)
      void changeBoard2​(int x, int y, int i, int j)
      this method changes the board for the valid move (white player)
      boolean checkDisk​(int x, int y, java.lang.String player, boolean putting)
      this method gets the coordinates of a move and checks if the move is valid
      boolean endGame()
      this method checks if the game has ended or not and then it prints the result
      void pass​(java.lang.String player)
      this method is for checking if the player has move or not
      void printBoard()
      this method prints the board
      void putDisk​(boolean canMove, java.lang.String player, int theX, int theY)
      this method puts the disks and changes the disks in between and updates the board game and then prints the updated map and checks if the game has ended or nor

    • Method Detail

      • checkDisk

        public boolean checkDisk​(int x,
                         int y,
                         java.lang.String player,
                         boolean putting)
        this method gets the coordinates of a move and checks if the move is valid
        Parameters:
        x - is the row of the coordinate
        y - is the column of the coordinate
        player - is the player which wants to move
        putting - is a boolean that separates the parts that pass method needs in this method
        Returns:
        a boolean named canMove which shows if the move is valid or not

      • putDisk

        public void putDisk​(boolean canMove,
                    java.lang.String player,
                    int theX,
                    int theY)
        this method puts the disks and changes the disks in between and updates the board game and then prints the updated map and checks if the game has ended or nor
        Parameters:
        canMove - shows if the move is valid
        player - is the player who is putting the disk
        theX - the row of the coordinate of the disk we want to put
        theY - the column of the coordinate of the disk we want to put

      • printBoard

        public void printBoard()
        this method prints the board

      • endGame

        public boolean endGame()
        this method checks if the game has ended or not and then it prints the result
        Returns:
        a boolean which shows if the game has ended or not

      • changeBoard1

        public void changeBoard1​(int x,
                         int y,
                         int i,
                         int j)
        this method changes the board for the valid move (black player)
        Parameters:
        x - is the valid row coordinate the player wants to put disk in there
        y - is the valid column coordinate the player wants to put disk in there
        i - is row the extension (the disks in between) that have to change
        j - is column the extension (the disks in between) that have to change

      • changeBoard2

        public void changeBoard2​(int x,
                         int y,
                         int i,
                         int j)
        this method changes the board for the valid move (white player)
        Parameters:
        x - is the valid row coordinate the player wants to put disk in there
        y - is the valid column coordinate the player wants to put disk in there
        i - is row the extension (the disks in between) that have to change
        j - is column the extension (the disks in between) that have to change

      • pass

        public void pass​(java.lang.String player)
        this method is for checking if the player has move or not
        Parameters:
        player - the player that we want to check
